PropertyList.title: Catalina PBY6 Water bomber

key.name: l (like "l"etter)
key.desc: release water over your target (water bombing)

key.name: L
key.desc: ask for water loading when ready

key.name: B
key.desc: toggle ON/OFF Brake Parking on ground or ON/OFF Cables/Anchor on water

key.name: o
key.desc: act auto control of the engine power for takeoff

key.name: O
key.desc: act auto control of the engine power for climb

key.name: m
key.desc: act auto control of the engine power for cruise

key.name: M
key.desc: unact auto control of the engine power, only manual control

PropertyList.text:
========================================= That Model is the Catalina PBY6 converted to be a water bomber It was in use in the south-east of France from 1964 to 1970 ========================================= Performance: That model is tuned ( altitude, climb and speed ) according to a payload of 10000 lbs, which is the water tank capacity filled up. Flying the Aircraft, without that payload, or equivalent, can give you an unrealistic performance. ========================================= START and STOP ROUTINE To start the engines =>increase magneto switch and electric master switch "on" ( key name "}") => start engines ( key "space" or "s" of you have a recent FlightGear version) then take off
To take off =>Unlock Brake parking (shift B) =>Push the throttle to maximum When speed 70 knots pull the stick The aircraft will take off
To stop the engines =>decrease magneto switch and electric master switch "off" ( key name "{")
WATER BOMBER You mays simulate the filling of the water tank ( 4000 liters) when =>on the water, you want the floats DOWN (key"f") =>prepare the filling (command key "L") => a speed minimum of 45 kts => push gently the elevator, just enough to keep the aircraft sliding in the water The filling duration time is 100 sec. Control your speed which must be more than 45 kts (if less it does not fill) More is better. During the filling, the aircraft is getting more and more heavy. When loaded the weight of the aircraft is heavier of 4500 kg , remember it at take off, you wants patience, and smooth piloting. Before climb, you must get the maximum of speed with the help of the groundeffect, which is your friend. After take off, don't forget, you want the floats UP (key"f")
Now you may simulate a water bombing => At a low agl, (let's say 200 ft) and over the target which is supposed to be bombed, => release the water (command key 'l" like "l"etter) The water can be seen falling down.
The aircraft is right now 4500 kg less , it will jump upper in the sky, be prepared for it. When empty don't forget to close the water tank doors ( key"D") You may again, go back on the sea and fill again, that process is repeatable as long as you wish it.
